name: WarZero
description:
This a game for the Sports Jam by Philly Game Mechanics.

This first build does not work well and I wouldn't recommend downloading this first build unless you want to get a sense of where this game might go in the future.

We plan to take this game in a different direction but for now this was design for the game jam in mind.

Team Credit:

  • Sound Engineer/Music:  Alex Cole
  • 3D Artist: Jon Crissey
  • Developers: Daniel Jung, Kotaro Fujita
